name: axe-webdriverjs-demo
description: How to set up aXe with WebdriverJS for automated testing.

scripts.test: ./node_modules/.bin/jasmine spec/testHome.js && echo ok || echo not ok
scripts.testall: ./node_modules/.bin/jasmine spec/*.js && echo ok || echo not ok
scripts.test1: ./node_modules/.bin/jasmine spec/testCheckoutPage.js && echo ok || echo not ok
scripts.test2: ./node_modules/.bin/jasmine spec/testFish.js && echo ok || echo not ok
scripts.test3: ./node_modules/.bin/jasmine spec/testAddKoi.js && echo ok || echo not ok
scripts.test4: ./node_modules/.bin/jasmine spec/testMainBanner.js && echo ok || echo not ok
scripts.test5: ./node_modules/.bin/jasmine spec/testJPetLogin.js && echo ok || echo not ok
scripts.test6: ./node_modules/.bin/jasmine spec/testKoi.js && echo ok || echo not ok
scripts.test7: ./node_modules/.bin/jasmine spec/testPetMain.js && echo ok || echo not ok
scripts.test8: ./node_modules/.bin/jasmine spec/testPetMainContent.js && echo ok || echo not ok
